1: {{ if eq .Status "resolved" }}{{ end }} {{ if eq .Status "firing" }}{{ end }} {{ index .CommonLabels.alertname }}

- job_name: "syno"
  static_configs:
  - targets: ["syno:9100"]
- job_name: "pinewall"
  static_configs:
  - targets: ["pinewall:9100"]

[upsmon]
  password  = "${NUT_PASSWORD}"
  actions = SET
  instcmds = ALL
  upsmon primary

[cyber-power]
  driver = usbhid-ups
  port = auto
  desc = "CyberPower CP1350PFCLCD"
  pollinterval = 10

MONITOR cyber-power@localhost:3493 1 upsmon "${NUT_PASSWORD}" primary
SHUTDOWNCMD "/sbin/shutdown -h +0"
POWERDOWNFLAG /etc/killpower
POLLFREQ 15
POLLFREQALERT 5
HOSTSYNC 15

0:
- job_name: unraid
  scheme: http
  scrape_interval: 60s
  static_configs:
    - targets: ['${HOST_OCEANO}.${DOMAIN}:9100']
- job_name: pfsense
  scheme: http
  scrape_interval: 60s
  static_configs:
    - targets: ['${HOST_PFSENSE}.${DOMAIN}:9100']
1:
- job_name: unraid
  scheme: http
  scrape_interval: 60s
  static_configs:
    - targets: ['${HOST_OCEANO}.${DOMAIN}:9100']
- job_name: pfsense
  scheme: http
  scrape_interval: 60s
  static_configs:
    - targets: ['${HOST_PFSENSE}.${DOMAIN}:9100']
- job_name: "TEST-KHC"
  scrape_interval: 60s
  static_configs:
    - targets: ["test-khc-node-exporter:9100"]
  honor_labels: true
  relabel_configs:
    - target_label: "cluster"
      replacement: "TEST-KHC"
- job_name: "TEST-KHC-KUBESTAT"
  scrape_interval: 60s
  static_configs:
    - targets: ["test-kube-state-metrics:8080"]
  honor_labels: true
  relabel_configs:
    - target_label: "cluster"
      replacement: "TEST-KHC"
- job_name: "VPSLAB"
  scrape_interval: 60s
  static_configs:
    - targets: ["vps-node-exporter:9100"]
  honor_labels: true
  relabel_configs:
    - target_label: "cluster"
      replacement: "VPSLAB"
- job_name: "VPSLAB-KUBESTAT"
  scrape_interval: 60s
  static_configs:
    - targets: ["vps-kube-state-metrics:8080"]
  honor_labels: true
  relabel_configs:
    - target_label: "cluster"
      replacement: "VPSLAB"
